history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: replicate,insert_concat. srun best use: length_replicate, insert_concat. qsimpl time: 1 use: replicate,insert_concat,concat_app.

ctx: intros A n x nx a b e1 H.
exceptions.tactic: rewrite <- (insert_concat A n x nx a e1 (replicate n b) H) at 1.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type n, x, nx : nat a : option A b : A e1 : env A H : n + x = nx The term "A" has type "Type" while it is expected to have type "nat".

ctx: intros A n x nx a b e1 H.

ctx: intros A n x nx a b e1 H.
exceptions.exn: In environment H1 : forall (A : Type) (e1 : env A) (e2 e3 : list A), concat e1 (e2 ++ e3) = concat (concat e1 e2) e3 H : forall (A : Type) (n x nx : nat) (o : option A) (e1 : env A) (e2 : list A), length e2 = n -> n + x = nx -> raw_insert nx o (concat e1 e2) = concat (raw_insert x o e1) e2 X, l : forall A : Type, nat -> A -> list A A : Type n, x : nat a : option A b : A e1 : env A Unable to unify "concat (raw_insert x a e1) (l A n b)" with "raw_insert (n + x) a (concat e1 (l A n b))".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (A : Type) (n x nx : nat) (a : option A) (b : A) (e1 : env A), n + x = nx -> raw_insert nx a (concat e1 (replicate n b)) = concat (raw_insert x a e1) (replicate n b)

Premises:
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula Arguments Tauto.GFormula {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.TT {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.FF {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.X {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.A {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments T
replicate : forall A : Type, nat -> A -> list A
raw_insert : forall A : Type, nat -> option A -> env A -> env A
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
env = fun A : Type => list (option A) : Type -> Type Arguments env _%type_scope
concat : forall A : Type, env A -> list A -> env A
Inductive option (A : Type) : Type := Some : A -> option A | None : option A Arguments option _%type_scope Arguments Some {A}%type_scope a : rename Arguments None {A}%type_scope
insert_concat : forall (A : Type) (n x nx : nat) (o : option A) (e1 : env A) (e2 : list A), length e2 = n -> n + x = nx -> raw_insert nx o (concat e1 e2) = concat (raw_insert x o e1) e2
agree_below : forall (A : Type) (e1 e2 : env A) (x : nat) (a : A) (k : nat), lookup x e1 = Some a -> x < k -> agree e1 e2 k -> lookup x e2 = Some a
length_replicate : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (a : A), length (replicate n a) = n
agree_insert : forall (A : Type) (e1 e2 : env A) (k : nat), agree e1 e2 k -> forall (x : nat) (o : option A), x <= k -> agree (raw_insert x o e1) (raw_insert x o e2) (1 + k)
insert_insert : forall (A : Type) (k s : nat) (a b : option A) (e : env A), k <= s -> raw_insert k a (raw_insert s b e) = raw_insert (1 + s) b (raw_insert k a e)
concat_app : forall (A : Type) (e1 : env A) (e2 e3 : list A), concat e1 (e2 ++ e3) = concat (concat e1 e2) e3
map_insert_eq : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (x : nat) (a : A) (b : B) (e : env A), f a = b -> map f (insert x a e) = insert x b (map f e)
insert_nil : forall (A : Type) (x : nat) (a : A) (e : env A), insert x a e = nil -> False
lookup_map_some_reverse : forall (A B : Type) (x : nat) (b : B) (e : env A) (f : A -> B), lookup x (map f e) = Some b -> exists a : A, lookup x e = Some a /\ b = f a
length_insert_independent : forall (A : Type) (e : env A) (k x : nat) (a : A), length (insert x a e) <= k -> forall (y : nat) (o : option A), y < k -> length (raw_insert y o e) <= k
insert_insert_always : forall (A : Type) (k s : nat) (a b : option A) (e : env A), raw_insert k a (raw_insert s b e) = raw_insert (shift k s) b (raw_insert (if le_gt_dec k s then k else k - 1) a e)
subsume_insert : forall (A : Type) (sub : A -> A -> Prop) (e1 e2 : env A), subsume sub e1 e2 -> forall (x : nat) (o1 o2 : option A), osub sub o1 o2 -> subsume sub (raw_insert x o1 e1) (raw_insert x o2 e2)
insert_eq_insert_2 : forall (A : Type) (x : nat) (a1 a2 : A) (e1 e2 : env A), insert x a1 e1 = insert x a2 e2 -> forall b : A, insert x b e1 = insert x b e2
agree_concat : forall (A : Type) (e : list A) (e1 e2 : env A) (k n : nat), agree e1 e2 k -> k + length e = n -> agree (concat e1 e) (concat e2 e) n
defined_implies_below_length : forall (A : Type) (e : env A) (x k : nat) (a : A), length e <= k -> lookup x e = Some a -> x < k
insert_eq_insert_1 : forall (A : Type) (x : nat) (a1 a2 : A) (e1 e2 : env A), insert x a1 e1 = insert x a2 e2 -> a1 = a2
length_insert_reverse_1 : forall (A : Type) (e : env A) (k x : nat) (a : A), length (insert x a e) <= k -> x < k
length_concat : forall (A : Type) (e2 : list A) (e1 : env A) (n1 n : nat), length e1 <= n1 -> n1 + length e2 = n -> length (concat e1 e2) <= n
lookup_insert_bingo : forall (A : Type) (x y : nat) (o : option A) (e : env A), x = y -> lookup x (raw_insert y o e) = o
lookup_map_some : forall (A B : Type) (x : nat) (a : A) (e : env A) (f : A -> B), lookup x e = Some a -> lookup x (map f e) = Some (f a)
lookup_insert_recent : forall (A : Type) (x y : nat) (o : option A) (e : env A), x < y -> lookup x (raw_insert y o e) = lookup x e
length_insert_reverse_2 : forall (A : Type) (e : env A) (k x : nat) (a : A), length (insert x a e) <= k + 1 -> length e <= k
map_insert : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (x : nat) (a : A) (e : env A), map f (insert x a e) = insert x (f a) (map f e)
subsume_insert_inversion : forall (A : Type) (sub : A -> A -> Prop) (e1 : env A) (x : nat) (a2 : A) (e2 : env A), subsume sub e1 (insert x a2 e2) -> exists (f1 : env A) (a1 : A), e1 = insert x a1 f1 /\ subsume sub f1 e2 /\ sub a1 a2
raw_insert_successor : forall (A : Type) (x : nat) (o : option A) (e : env A), raw_insert (S x) o e = lookup 0 e :: raw_insert x o (tl e)

```coq
intros A n x nx a b e1 H.
rewrite <- (insert_concat A n x nx a e1 (replicate n b) H) at 1.
rewrite concat_app.
reflexivity.
Qed.```

original: intros A n x nx a b e1 H. rewrite <- (insert_concat A n x nx a e1 (replicate n b) H) at 1. rewrite concat_app. reflexivity.
